lead_paragraph: Jeff Carter scored 40 seconds into overtime after Kris Versteeg tied it with 35.1 seconds left in the third period to help the Los Angeles Kings beat the Calgary Flames 5-4 on Tuesday night.

headline.print_headline: Carter Scores in OT, Kings Beat Flames 5-4
headline.main: Carter Scores in OT, Kings Beat Flames 5-4
